original_title: Songs of Injustice: Heavy Metal Music in Latin America
overview: In this documentary film a team of researchers examine the social contexts that influenced the emergence and permanence of heavy metal music in Chile, Argentina, Mexico and Peru. Colonialism, dictatorships, terrorism and neoliberal exploitation serve as points of reference for how heavy metal in the region has been directly linked to each country's social and political context.
tagline: Experience Latin America through the eyes of heavy metal musicians
title: Songs of Injustice: Heavy Metal Music in Latin America
